column4: you have to start somewhere man, its better than trying to do things in a UI when you can learn the commands through the guide... if you spend the time to learn the commands ofcourse
but the desktop wil need configging from CLI anyway, requiring just as much work as if you just configure the apps from cli without the desktop
Exactly, i disagree with GUI on a server, but hey, whatever suits people
ask in #ubuntu+1 for Quantal support please
